The more Kairo tokens you own, the more money you will manage, the more commission you will receive. You will be able to earn Kairo tokens by making profitable investments for the Betoken fund.

20% of the fund's profit and 0.1% of the AUM is set aside as commissions every month, which is paid to managers proportional to the Kairo tokens they hold. The estimate displayed here is calculated using the current fund ROI.

The first 3 days are reserved for letting the news of the upgrade propagate.
Any manager can propose a smart contract as the upgrade candidate, unless another manager with more votes has proposed/proposes a candidate.
You can change the upgrade candidate if you are the current proposer or have more votes than the current proposer.

cycle for which to redeem commission

You can redeem your commissions in Betoken fund shares (BTKS) - meaning you swap your commissions for an equivalent number of shares in the fund. By doing so, you will make the fund Assets Under Management (AUM) grow quicker. A bigger AUM means more money to manage in the next cycle, and more commissions for you.
The amount of Betoken Shares tokens (BTKS) you own.
The value of your Betoken Shares, in DAI Stablecoin.
The price of 1 Betoken Share token.

A maximum drawdown (MDD) is the maximum observed loss from a peak to a trough of a portfolio, before a new peak is attained. Maximum drawdown is an indicator of downside risk over a specified time period.

Betoken enables capital connection and managing using smart contracts which are open source. Betoken does not take custody of tokens and is only a collaborative hub for investors and managers. Betoken is not a licensed bank, broker-dealer, investment advisor or an exchange. Betoken uses partner protocols (Kyber, Compound, bZx, Maker DAO) to power its own ecosystem.

If you think 2 brains are better than one...How about hundreds of talented asset managers working for you? Worldwide!
Your capital is automatically distributed among
The best of them will have the most influence over how that capital is put to work.
By depositing your capital on Betoken protocol, you gain exposure to ETH, WBTC, BAT, MKR and 70+ ERC20 tokens.
Betoken allows anyone to buy or sell any amount of Betoken Shares, and Betoken's fee structure is completely transparent.
More about fees, lockup, and liquidity
You always stay in control, it’s written on the blockchain. All user funds are locked in smart contracts, no one but you has direct access to those funds.
💀 This project is in beta. Use at your own risk.
Can I buy and sell Betoken Shares at any time?
Yes. Betoken's protocol is 100% liquid. You can buy and sell Betoken shares at any time in 2 ways:
During Betoken's 3 days intermission phase that happens every 27 days, you can buy and sell Betoken shares directly on the investor dashboard.

During Betoken's management phase (27 days), Betoken shares token is freely tradable on decentralized exchanges (Fork Delta, Uniswap). Depending of the market conditions, the price may be different from what's displayed on the investor dashboard.
How can I buy Betoken Shares?
Click on the Get Started button and follow the instructions. You'll be able to use Ether or any of our 70+ supported ERC-20 tokens to buy Betoken Shares.
After the management phase is over (every 27 days):
IF the fund is profitable OR not profitable

0.1% of the total Betoken funds is set aside and distributed among fund manager holding Kairo tokens.
In order to provide funding for its maintenance and future development, Betoken protocol will mint Betoken Shares and send them to the current development team. The amount will be equal to 0.1% of the current Betoken Shares total supply, and it will occur at the end of every investment cycle.
ONLY IF the fund is profitable

20% of the total Betoken's monthly profits is set aside as commission and distributed among fund managers holding Kairo tokens proportional to the amount they hold and their risk profile. The commission is taken into account IF and ONLY IF the fund is profitable during the actual investment cycle.
How can I follow the activity of the fund?
You have access to a dashboard where you can view your capital account.
Can’t find what you’re looking for?
I want to buy Betoken shares with
Connect your crypto-trading expertise to the Betoken's pool of capital and earn commissions!
The best managers earn the most

The Betoken protocol recognizes and quantifies the talent of its fund managers by allocating units of reputation to them, denominated in Kairo tokens, and financially rewards them based on their talent and contributions. The more Kairo tokens you have, the more money in the Betoken fund you can manage and the more income you’ll get every month as commissions on your investments.

Betoken uses the full value of the open finance ecosystem like Kyber Network, Compound, Fulcrum by bZx and DAI stable coin. These financial primitives enable margin trading with up to 4x leverage on Betoken and guaranteed liquidity.

Kairo is Betoken's non-transferable reputation token. Managers need to possess Kairo tokens to manage funds on Betoken. They represent how good a manager is at investing. The more Kairo tokens you have, the more money in the Betoken fund you can manage and the more income you’ll get every month as commissions on your investments.
How can I buy Kairo tokens?
Click on the Get Started button and follow the instructions. You'll be able to use Ether or any of our 70+ supported ERC-20 tokens to buy Kairo tokens.
Do I receive my Kairo tokens immediately after purchase?
Yes. The Kairo tokens will be given to your wallet after your purchase transaction has been accepted by the Ethereum blockchain, which may take up to a few minutes.
IF the fund is profitable OR not profitable
0.1% of the total Betoken funds is set aside and distributed among fund manager holding Kairo tokens.
ONLY IF the fund is profitable

20% of the total Betoken's monthly profits is set aside as commission and distributed among fund managers holding Kairo tokens proportional to the amount they hold and their risk profile. The commission is taken into account IF and ONLY IF the fund is profitable during the actual investment cycle.
How can I manage and follow the activity of the fund?
You have access to a Portal where you can view Betoken's fund performances and your manager trading interface.
Can I sell my Kairo tokens?
No. Kairo is a non-transferable reputation token, which means that you cannot sell or give your Kairo tokens to someone else.
Can I buy more Kairo tokens after with the same Wallet address?
No. You can only buy Kairo tokens once per Ethereum account.
How many Kairo tokens do you want to buy?
You understand that you can only buy Kairo tokens once per Ethereum account
